info.task: navigate backwards to a slider thumb
info.title: Navigate backwards to a slider thumb in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterSlider
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the second slider thumb
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the slider
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Hotel Maximum Price in US dollars' slider thumb.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Hotel Maximum Price in US dollars' slider thumb.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, exit Forms Mode to activate the Virtual Cursor by pressing Escape.

assertions.expectation: Name 'Hotel Maximum Price in US dollars' is conveyed
